name: Medical_Steward_v1
description: A DEME 2.0 profile for medical/clinical environments with strong patient rights protections and safety focus.
notes: This profile prioritizes patient safety and autonomy in medical contexts. It uses the full DEME 2.0 three-layer architecture with tiered EMs. Constitutional (Tier 0) and Core Safety (Tier 1) EMs have veto power. Rights/Fairness EMs (Tier 2) can also veto in this configuration. Soft values and meta-governance provide advisory input.
